title: Turkey’s anti-democratic crackdown is damaging its economy
description: IF YOUR ONLY source of information were market data, you might think a measure of calm had returned to Turkey this week, after the chaos caused by the arrest on March 19th of Ekrem Imamoglu , the mayor of Istanbul. The country’s stockmarket index rose by 2.8% on March 24th after plummeting by 16.3% ...
